questions.question: Is the chevron quilting pattern present on the front panel of the bag, forming a series of diagonal V-shapes?
questions.explanation: In Image B, which appears to be a stylized illustration, the front panel of the bag shows lines forming V-shapes. In illustrations, even simplified representations aim to capture recognizable features, similar to quilting patterns visible through such repetitive detailing. This hints at an implied chevron pattern.

questions.question: Are there gold-colored zippers located horizontally across the front pocket and vertically along the side panels of the bag?
questions.explanation: Image B, being an illustration, depicts simple lines and colored elements to mimic zipper elements. Only a horizontal line is visible, representing the front zipper, but not enough information to ascertain vertical side zippers, which doesn't imply their presence.

questions.question: Is the brand plaque with the word "REACTION" in white capital letters on a black background positioned centrally above the front horizontal zipper?
questions.explanation: The illustration in Image B depicts a central emblem above a horizontal line (representing a zipper), but clear signage or text details are not visible. Without visible words, one cannot confidently confirm the presence or style.

questions.question: Are there two black curved handles attached at the top of the bag, secured with gold-tone hardware?
questions.explanation: The bag's illustration in Image B features two prominently visible handles, a typical hue of black in contrast, likely attached at the top with hint-like details of colored connections resembling metallic hardware.

questions.question: Does the bag maintain a rectangular shape with slightly rounded corners and a flat base?
questions.explanation: The general shape depicted in Image B, with illustrated contours and corners, supports a geometric, rectangular impression. Even stylized, illustrations try to maintain key structural elements, suggesting usability akin to full angles rather than flat corners.
